Top options for DGW32 by FPL points per 90 mins

Rasmus Wiscostretford

2019-03-21

Source: vignettes/dgw32ppms.Rmd
dgw32ppms.Rmd

Suppose we are interested in the top options for DGW32, measured by FPL points per 90 mins (pp90) so far this season?

With fplscrapR, we can do that just a few lines of code:

library(fplscrapR)
library(dplyr)
df <- get_player_info()

df %>% 
  filter(total_points >= 30) %>% # filtering for players with more than 30 points scored
  filter(team %in% c(3,5,6,7,9,13,14,17,18,20)) %>% # filtering for teams with a DGW in GW32 
  mutate(pp90 = total_points / minutes * 90) %>% # creating the 'pp90' variable
  select(playername,pp90) %>% # selecting player name and ppm for our table
  arrange(-pp90) %>% # ordering (arranging) by ppm
  slice(1:20) # showing just the top20
##                   playername     pp90
## 1            Raheem Sterling 8.315446
## 2                 Leroy Sané 7.810651
## 3              Heung-Min Son 7.784692
## 4              Sergio Agüero 7.750522
## 5         Ruben Loftus-Cheek 7.302632
## 6            Anthony Martial 7.197205
## 7                Eden Hazard 7.116459
## 8  Gabriel Fernando de Jesus 6.996466
## 9             Ivan Cavaleiro 6.746167
## 10              Riyad Mahrez 6.657963
## 11            Benjamin Mendy 6.333333
## 12                Harry Kane 6.259474
## 13   Pedro Rodríguez Ledesma 6.097561
## 14              Ross Barkley 6.023278
## 15           Gerard Deulofeu 6.003886
## 16                Paul Pogba 5.942282
## 17               Erik Lamela 5.871766
## 18            Olivier Giroud 5.814978
## 19               David Silva 5.657686
## 20              Raúl Jiménez 5.588474
